tooltip.namespace.path.name: <rgb>Diamond!</rgb>
tooltip.namespace.path.0: wow a fancy <rgb>description!</rgb> very <gradient-03>cool</gradient-30> description me thinks.
tooltip.namespace.path.1: You can add <rgb>more lines</rgb> by just simply doing .1 .2 etc!
tooltip.namespace.path.2: <gradient-30>You can define a gradient like this!</gradient-60>
tooltip.namespace.path.3: The 30 and 60 refer to a scale from 00 to 99 for the hue.
tooltip.namespace.path.5: You can make a 'line break' by just leaving the translation empty like this.
tooltip.namespace.path.7: skipping a number will stop the tooltip 'cycle', so don't do that. this text will never be rendered
tooltip.namespace.path.8: This works with any item or block, not just your mod or vanilla!
